name: The Endless 8
description:
A mysterious figure has tasked you with an assassination. Simple enough, just one, tiny, problem. You have no clue who you have to kill. All you have is a short description of the person in question, and a magical device which makes you relive the same day 8 times. Do you have what it takes to find your target within this loop?

The Endless 8 is a game about investigation. Converse with the characters in the story to find out more about each, and everyone of them.

Take an imaginary dive in the pool! Talk! Watch some tv! Listen to the jukebox! Contemplate killing someone! Stand in a spotlight! He's got his trains!
